title: Danny Goldberg: "Bloody Crossroads 2020"
description: Michael sits down with Danny Goldberg with his new book "Bloody Crossroads 2020: Art, Entertainment, and Resistance to Trump." Original air date 22 December 2021. The book was published on 2 November 2021.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Danny Goldberg, Michael Smerconish)
